text: Uss Allah ki nishaniyon mein say (yeh bhi) hai kay tu zamin ko dabi dabaee dekhta hai phir jab hum iss per meenh barsatay hain to woh tar-o-taza hoker ubharney lagti hai. Jiss ney ussay zindah kiya wohi yaqeeni tor per murdon ko bhi zindah kerney wala hai be-shak woh her (her) cheez per qadir hai
